trans-unit.source: .NET Core Pre-Requisites
trans-unit.target: .NET Core Pre-Requisites

trans-unit.source: .NET Core Pre-Requisites
trans-unit.target: .NET Core Pre-Requisites

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Pre-Requisites for Windows Development
trans-unit.target: Pre-Requisites for Windows Development

trans-unit.source: .NET Core development on Windows with Visual Studio requires:
trans-unit.target: .NET Core development on Windows with Visual Studio requires:

trans-unit.source: A supported version of the Windows client or operating system.
trans-unit.target: A supported version of the Windows client or operating system.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3 or later
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3 or later

trans-unit.source: NuGet Manager extension for Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: NuGet Manager extension for Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: .NET Core Tooling Preview 2
trans-unit.target: .NET Core Tooling Preview 2

trans-unit.source: Supported Windows Versions
trans-unit.target: Supported Windows Versions

trans-unit.source: .NET Core 1.0 is supported on the following verions of Windows:
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 1.0 is supported on the following verions of Windows:

trans-unit.source: Windows 7+ / Server 2012 R2+
trans-unit.target: Windows 7+ / Server 2012 R2+

trans-unit.source: Windows Nano Server TP5
trans-unit.target: Windows Nano Server TP5

trans-unit.source: You can see the full set of [suppported operating systems](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md#rtm-platform-support) in in the [.NET Core Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md).
trans-unit.target: You can see the full set of [suppported operating systems](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md#rtm-platform-support) in in the [.NET Core Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md).

trans-unit.source: .NET Core dependencies
trans-unit.target: .NET Core dependencies

trans-unit.source: .NET Core requires the VC++ Redistributable when running on Windows.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core requires the VC++ Redistributable when running on Windows.

trans-unit.source: It is installed for you by the .NET Core installer.
trans-unit.target: It is installed for you by the .NET Core installer.

trans-unit.source: You need to install the Visual C++ redistributable manually is if you are installing .NET Core via the installer script (`dotnet-install.ps1`).
trans-unit.target: You need to install the Visual C++ redistributable manually is if you are installing .NET Core via the installer script (`dotnet-install.ps1`).

trans-unit.source: The Visual C++ Redistributable version differs by Windows version.
trans-unit.target: The Visual C++ Redistributable version differs by Windows version.

trans-unit.source: Windows 10
trans-unit.target: Windows 10

trans-unit.source: Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015
trans-unit.target: Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015

trans-unit.source: Windows 7+ (not Windows 10)
trans-unit.target: Windows 7+ (not Windows 10)

trans-unit.source: Please make sure that your Windows installation is up-to-date and includes hotfix [KB2533623](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2533623) installed through Windows Update.
trans-unit.target: Please make sure that your Windows installation is up-to-date and includes hotfix [KB2533623](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2533623) installed through Windows Update.

trans-unit.source: [Universal CRT update](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48234) (you can get more info on what Universal CRT is in [this blog post](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/vcblog/2015/03/03/introducing-the-universal-crt/))
trans-unit.target: [Universal CRT update](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48234) (you can get more info on what Universal CRT is in [this blog post](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/vcblog/2015/03/03/introducing-the-universal-crt/))

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: You need Visual Studio 2015 to develop .NET Core apps.
trans-unit.target: You need Visual Studio 2015 to develop .NET Core apps.

trans-unit.source: You can download [Visual Studio Community 2015](https://www.visualstudio.com/downloads/download-visual-studio-vs) for free.
trans-unit.target: You can download [Visual Studio Community 2015](https://www.visualstudio.com/downloads/download-visual-studio-vs) for free.

trans-unit.source: Verify that you're running [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3](https://www.visualstudio.com/news/releasenotes/vs2015-update3-vs):
trans-unit.target: Verify that you're running [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3](https://www.visualstudio.com/news/releasenotes/vs2015-update3-vs):

trans-unit.source: On the **Help** menu, choose **About Microsoft Visual Studio**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Help** menu, choose **About Microsoft Visual Studio**.

trans-unit.source: In the About Microsoft Visual Studio dialog, the version number should be 14.0.25424.00 or higher, and include "Update 3".
trans-unit.target: In the About Microsoft Visual Studio dialog, the version number should be 14.0.25424.00 or higher, and include "Update 3".

trans-unit.source: If you don't have Update 3, you can download and install [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3](https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/news/releasenotes/vs2015-update3-vs).
trans-unit.target: If you don't have Update 3, you can download and install [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3](https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/news/releasenotes/vs2015-update3-vs).

trans-unit.source: If you have Update 3, you download and install [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt752379.aspx).
trans-unit.target: If you have Update 3, you download and install [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt752379.aspx).

trans-unit.source: You can read more about the changes in Update 3.3 in the [release notes](https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/news/releasenotes/vs2015-update3-vs).
trans-unit.target: You can read more about the changes in Update 3.3 in the [release notes](https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/news/releasenotes/vs2015-update3-vs).

trans-unit.source: NuGet Manager extension for Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: NuGet Manager extension for Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: NuGet is the package manager for the Microsoft development platform including .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: NuGet is the package manager for the Microsoft development platform including .NET Core.

trans-unit.source: You need [NuGet 3.5.0](https://dist.nuget.org/visualstudio-2015-vsix/v3.5.0-beta/NuGet.Tools.vsix) or higher to build .NET Core apps.
trans-unit.target: You need [NuGet 3.5.0](https://dist.nuget.org/visualstudio-2015-vsix/v3.5.0-beta/NuGet.Tools.vsix) or higher to build .NET Core apps.

trans-unit.source: .NET Core Tools for Visual Studio 2015
trans-unit.target: .NET Core Tools for Visual Studio 2015

trans-unit.source: Download and install the [.NET Core Tooling Preview 2 for Visual Studio 2015](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=817245).
trans-unit.target: Download and install the [.NET Core Tooling Preview 2 for Visual Studio 2015](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=817245).

trans-unit.source: The .NET Core Tooling package installs .NET Core, project templates and other tools for Visual Studio 2015.
trans-unit.target: The .NET Core Tooling package installs .NET Core, project templates and other tools for Visual Studio 2015.

trans-unit.source: Issues
trans-unit.target: Issues

trans-unit.source: You may be blocked from installing the [.NET Core Tooling Preview 2 for Visual Studio 2015](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=817245) installer due to a temporary bug.
trans-unit.target: You may be blocked from installing the [.NET Core Tooling Preview 2 for Visual Studio 2015](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=817245) installer due to a temporary bug.

trans-unit.source: To workaround it, run the installer from the commandline with the `SKIP_VSU_CHECK=1` argument, as you see in the example below.
trans-unit.target: To workaround it, run the installer from the commandline with the `SKIP_VSU_CHECK=1` argument, as you see in the example below.
